30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (18:26): I'm having a problem with smpatch. When I do "smpatch update -L", I got these errors here http://pastebin.ca/92319 . Can someone please assist ?
e55e49dbdc0b3b324ddec7711f265523 (18:27): change your path to use java 1.5
e55e49dbdc0b3b324ddec7711f265523 (18:28): this message you're trying to execute a java class with a prior version of jre
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (18:28): ahhhh, that's it then...I changed to a previous java 1.4.2 the other day
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (18:28): thanks a lot, asyd
e55e49dbdc0b3b324ddec7711f265523 (18:29): you're welcome. (btw, you should try pca insteand smpatch :)
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (18:31): smpatch seems simple for me :)
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (18:31): why do you prefer pca, may i ask ?
e55e49dbdc0b3b324ddec7711f265523 (18:32): more features than smpatch, it's not java (perl), just a frontend to patchadd, and is aware of some patch probleme
eab42c169adc8c5d2f875bf2e9aac3f2 (18:38): is there a way for me to install patches from Sun via smc?
eab42c169adc8c5d2f875bf2e9aac3f2 (18:43): huh?
